page.title: 20Riding Schools.
page.content: Horse riding is popular in the New Forest and there are a number of riding schools and stables in the area. Burley Villa Riding School was opened 20 years ago. It has 30 horses including a Horse of the year show finalist and 2 full time instructors. Students include holiday makers, local people and groups staying at local hotels. A large undercover equestrian centre is used for instruction and competitions. The compilation of our survey would not have been possible without help from the following people.Mr.& Mrs P. Atlas,Wg.Cdr.R.Walker,Miss G.Meaden all of Sway.The Loader family of Bashley.Mr S. Beaton,Bashley Park.The Fortune Riding Centre.The Hewson family,the children & staff of Tiptoe Primary and New Milton Junior schools.
